cmp: 斗 (Chinese peck, to fight/to battle/to struggle/to incite, fight/incite)
mng: branch of study, administrative section, division, field, branch, stage directions, family (taxonomy), rules, laws, to mete out (punishment), to levy (taxes etc), to fine sb

exm.mng: universal, encyclopedic, abbr. for 百科全書|百科全书[bai3 ke1 quan2 shu1]
subject, branch of learning, course, academic discipline
science fiction, abbr. for 科學幻想|科学幻想[ke1 xue2 huan4 xiang3]
